name: The Ancient Sky
description:
A gamejam game inspired by LineRider!

Draw lines in the night sky for the Ghost Seeker to sled across, creating constellations by touching stars! After forming a constellations, Granny Ghost will tell a little story about it's meaning, or about anything, really!

Made in a little over 2 days in total by me in Game Maker studio 2. Featuring music by Harriet Ford Music!

Made with the CleanShapes and Scribble libraries by Juju Adams!
